caption.p: Theoretical predictions (left) and empirical data (right) for physicochemical-parameter responses to reducing catchment glacier cover across the Northern Hemisphere. Data adapted from (a) Gíslason and colleagues ( 2001), (b) Thompson and colleagues ( 2013), (c) Gíslason and colleagues ( 2001), (d) Khamis and colleagues ( 2016), (e) Maiolini and colleagues (2001), and (f) Rott and colleagues ( 2006).
